short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevents grandpa from lookin' at his favorite propaganda.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NOW AUTOMATICALLY UPDATES!
Boomer parents becoming increasingly radical over time? Got a friend who's starting down the path of white supremacy? Thinking your friends are sneaking in that direction and it's freaking you out? No problem! Just get this app onto their browser and they'll be redirected from their favorite propaganda to more rational news sources. It's like child block for the elderly!
